title: At the spring sea ice camp. Pt. 1
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Quentin Brown and Kevin Smith
brief_description: Netsilik Inuit Eskimo families travel across the sea ice. Before night falls, they build igloos. A boy practices spear throwing at a figure built in the snow while a woman crimps the sole of a sealskin boot.
